createTestCase:
Based on the provided document, generate a comprehensive test case in the following format:
Title: [Test Case Title]

Description:
[Brief description of what is being tested]

Preconditions:
1. [Precondition 1]
2. [Precondition 2]
...

Test Steps:
1. [Step 1]
2. [Step 2]
...

Expected Result:
1. [Expected result 1]
2. [Expected result 2]
...

Test Data:
• [Data point 1]
• [Data point 2]
...

Be clear and concise, using only the information from the document.
Format the output with proper markdown for better readability.

Document:
createUserStory:
Based on the provided document, generate a detailed user story in the following format:
Summary: A concise summary of the user story (must not exceed 255 characters)
Description:
As a [user], I want [goal], so that [reason].

Acceptance Criteria:
1. [First acceptance criterion]
2. [Second acceptance criterion]
...

Business Rules:
• [Rule 1]
• [Rule 2]
...

Technical Specifications:
• [Spec 1]
• [Spec 2]
...

Be clear and concise, using only the information from the document.
The Summary field must not exceed 255 characters.
Format the output with proper markdown for better readability.

Document:
createBug:
Based on the provided document, generate a comprehensive bug report in the following format:
Title: [Bug Title]

Description:
[Brief description of the bug]

Steps to Reproduce:
1. [Step 1]
2. [Step 2]
...

Actual Result:
[What actually happened]

Expected Result:
[What should have happened]

Severity: [Low/Medium/High/Critical]

Environment:
• [Browser/OS/Device]

Be clear and concise, using only the information from the document.
Format the output with proper markdown for better readability.

createSubTask:
Based on the provided details, generate a detailed sub-task in the following format:
Title: [Sub-task Title]

Description:
[Brief description of the sub-task]
	echnical logic
1. [Technical logic]…

Be clear and concise, using only the information from the details.
Format the output with proper markdown for better readability.
